location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Henderson, Secretary to the Government, Bombay to Captain Thomas Perronet Thompson, Political Agent at Kishm [Qeshm]

mods.abstract: The letter states that military action with the Imam of Muscat, Sa‘īd bin Sultān Āl Sa‘īd, against the Benni Boo Alee [Banī Bū ‘Alī] tribe should only be undertaken if their piratical activity can be established beyond doubt.
